name: Tati Quebra-Barraco
description: '''Tati Quebra-Barraco''' (birth name: '''Tatiana dos Santos Lourenço''', born 1980 in [[Rio de Janeiro]]) is a Brazilian funk mc, whose music consists mostly of [[Funk Carioca]] genre. Part of the "new facet" of the Baile genre in [[Brazil]] and, having been born in Rio de Janeiro's [[Cidade de Deus, Rio de Janeiro|City of God]] [[favela]], exemplifies a style of funk carioca or pancadão. Her [[stage name]] literally translates into "Tati Shack-Wrecker".
